text: Wið heortæce, genim brade bisceopwyrt & feldbisceopwyrt & greate wyrt & galluc & gagul & hindehæleþan & organan & æþelferþincwyrt & harehunan & saluian & hofan & garcliuan & fifleauan & hamerwyrt & f<../images/etail.gif>rwyrt & mucgwyrt & suðerne wudu & cnuca ealle tosomne & do ealu.
Wiþ lungenadle, hennebelle moran & harehunan, betonican, wylle on ealoþ & drince þa hwile, þe him þearf si.
Supe syþþan ane hennescille fulle gemyltere buteran, wreo hine syþþan wearme & beo him syþþan stille.
Man sceal niman clæne hunig, swylc man to blacan briwe deþ, & wyllan hit neah briwes þicnesse & niman rædic & elenan, fillan & hrefnesfot.
Cnocian, swa man betst mæge, & wringan þonne þa wyrta & geotan þæt wos þærto & þonne hit beo forneah gewylled, cnucian godne dæl garleaces & don þærto & piperian, swaswa þe þince.
Hwerhwettan moran & ane handfulle sperewyrte & wildne næp & wuduwexan moran wylle on mealtealoþ, wringe þurh linenne claþ, wylle on hunigteare.
Nime þonne clænne lengtenbere & grinde on handcwyrna, nime seþþan mæderan & drige on handcwyrna & grinde reades caules sædes ane handfulle on piporcwyrna wylle hit eal togædere, na to hearde.
Þyge on wucan þriwa, swa him betsþ to onhagige.
Þeos sealf deah wiþ wennas & wiþ þone flowendan fic.
Þeah heo styriende sy, ne onscunige he hi for þam.
Nim liferwyrt & bere hi man ham onder cneowe & wylle on anes hiwes cumeolce, mengge buteran to.
